page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE KIRKBY FLEETHAM
page.content: ONE SIXTH OF THE CHILDREN REGULARLY HELP WITH FAMILY SHOPPING AT THE NEAREST LARGE TOWNS.VILLAGE SHOPPING IS LIMITED TO INDIVIUAL ITEMS AND TO THAT DONE BY OLDER PEOPLE IN THE MAIN. THE 10 TEENAGERS IN THE VILLAGE GO TO THE LOCAL PUB APPROX. TWICE A WEEK 17 FAMILIES HAVE TWO PARENTS WHO WORK -THOUGH MOST MOTHERS WORK PART TIME RATHER THAN FULL TIME. THE MAJORITY OF FAMILIES IN THE VILLAGES HAVE TWO CHILDREN.THE LARGEST FAMILY HAS FOUR CHILDREN.THERE ARE SEVERAL FAMILIES WITH ONLY ONE PARENT. THREE FAMILIES FROM THE VILLAGES SEND THEIR CHILDREN TO PRIVATE SCHOOLS.
